On GitHub

Releases

Binary releases are published on GitHub

Build from sources

Alternately, it is possible to build YAYC from sources. To do so, a Qt 5.15 installation is necessary, together with a C++ toolchain (gcc on Linux, msvc on Windows). Please note that OpenSSL needs to be enable and working within the Qt 5.15 installation. More details on how to proceed setting up the build environment can be found on the project page
